tool_description:
Global Chem is an open-source graph database and api for common and rare chemical lists using IUPAC as input and SMILES/SMARTS as output. 

Our API base featuers fetches data for different nodes, or dictionary look ups, or all the data at once as it 's being updated. Our paid version will have more features include things for data analysis and data processing.
name: Global Chem
title: Global Chem

api_list.name: get_nodes_all_nodes_get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-chem.p.rapidapi.com/all_nodes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-chem.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
